    • About Tim Peirce


    A committed, successful real estate professional, Tim hungered for a higher standard of excellence than the industry at large. With real estate such an essential service in our region, he grew impatient with the wide variations he saw in performance and professionalism. That inspiration is why Tim started The Peirce Group. Many team-members met Tim as a teacher; all rely on Tim as a mentor.

    Tim Peirce
